segments.text: I can see the boy's determination as he stretches for the cookies, and it gives me a thrill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so daring, yet I feel a wave of dread wash over me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The splayed legs of the stool are a clear warning sign, but he seems oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should intervene, but what would I even say?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Watching the girl with her hand raised makes me chuckle a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little conspiracy is adorable yet troubling at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess this could all turn into if theyâ€™re not careful!
segments.speaker: PAR
